name: Car Driving Extreme
description:
Drive your super car through Beautiful city and Accelerate your car in the city faster between cars and trucks in rush time. Keep accelerating car to get the extreme speed.
Drive your car fast, furious and do stunts enjoy super speedy car driving game free!!

Features:
• Extremely Super Car Driving sim .
• Amazing collection of Super formula sports cars.
• High Quality visuals and 3D graphics.
• Multiple camera views to give you the maximum reality experience.
• Most realistic City Car driving simulation.
• Realistic simulator experience.
